transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello? Haan ji.
Executive: Haan ji. India Mart.
Customer: Haan ji, kahan se baat kar rahe hain?
Executive: Shashaank baat kar raha hun Stylus Baba Ajmer se.
Customer: Haan bataiye.
Executive: Isse mere ko sale karni hai India Mart pe.
Customer: Kya karni hai?
Executive: Maine buy lead consume kiya hai.
Customer: Sir, main abhi aapko na office nahi pahunchi hun. Thoda late ja rahi hun. Main mujhe office mein 10-11 baje office pahunch ke aapko call back karungi, theek hai?

Executive: Haan, theek hai.
Customer: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Sale on India Mart.

- Buy lead consume.



Resolution:

- None



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved.

- Customer will call back at 10-11 AM after reaching the office.



Alert (If Any):

None



@@@Sentiment:

Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

india mart, sale, buy lead, callback
